TopicTitle: How can i start tracking an asteroid?

Articles.Content: I've found quite a few asteroids heading twords kerbin's SOI it looks as if it is, The signal is full how do i start tracking is there a button or does it automatically start?

Go to the tracking station, select a roid, and look down in the lower left corner. There'll be a blue button with a radar dish on it. Hit that and you're tracking that roid.

NOTE: If you track every roid, the space around Kerbin's orbit will become choked with their tracks so if you don't want to mess with a roid once you've tracked it, select it again and hit the X button to stop tracking it. Its track will go away and eventually the untracked roid will despawn.
Yay you figured it out! Closed as requested.
